name: Bl0w-Up
description:
In order to fulfill the last will of its former master, the M-98 "Barbara" must purge the remains of Earth from all alien invaders.

The M-98 "Barbara" is a machine so it doesn't have emotions such as mercy, the aliens must be destroyed in the most efficient way possible in order to get the best score at the end of the stage.

Credits

Developement: Llibert_Gamedev  

Music: Jordi Prieto

Cover Art:  Rubén Barriga Molero

Demo

The demo features the first stage of the game with some custom traits. Feel free to comment down below your impressions and follow us to keep up with development!

What to expect from the final game

Overall improvements based on feedback, 10 unique levels + extras or secrets, 2 bosses, more enemy variants, more weapons, controller support and much more!
